==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|け|が|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Uncertain. Likely the root of verbs {{m|ja|汚れる}}, {{m|ja|穢れる|tr=kegareru||to become soiled, to get dirty}}; {{m|ja|汚す}}, {{m|ja|穢す|tr=kegasu||to soil something, to make something dirty}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> The kanji are [[ateji]].<ref name="KDJ"/><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=go|けが|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{ja-l|ケガ}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|けが}}

# an [[injury]], a [[wound]]
#: {{ja-usex|彼は登校中に'''怪我'''をしたようだ。|^かれ は とうこうちゅう に '''けが''' を した よう だ。|He seems to have '''hurt''' himself while going to school.}}

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|傷|きず}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|けが}}

# to get [[hurt]], to [[injure]] oneself

{{ja-suru|けが}}
